org.keycloak.scripting

Class DefaultScriptingProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.keycloak.scripting.DefaultScriptingProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Provider, ScriptingProvider

    public class DefaultScriptingProvider
extends Object
implements ScriptingProvider
    A ScriptingProvider that uses a ScriptEngineManager to evaluate scripts with a ScriptEngine.
    Author:
    Thomas Darimont

      • prepareScript

        public InvocableScript prepareScript(ScriptModel script,
                                     ScriptBindingsConfigurer bindingsConfigurer)
        Description copied from interface: ScriptingProvider
        Returns an InvocableScript based on the given ScriptModel.

        The InvocableScript wraps a dedicated ScriptEngine that was populated with the provided ScriptBindingsConfigurer

        Specified by:
        prepareScript in interface ScriptingProvider
        Parameters:
        script - the script to wrap
        bindingsConfigurer - populates the Bindings
